props.name: theme
props.description: Specify theme properties to override specific styles for calendar parts

props.name: events
props.description: List of events to render on the timeline

props.name: onEventPress
props.description: Handler which gets executed when event is pressed

props.name: onBackgroundLongPress
props.description: Handler which gets executed when background is long pressed. Pass to handle creation of a new event

props.name: onBackgroundLongPressOut
props.description: Handler which gets executed when background's long pressed released. Pass to handle creation of a new event

props.name: scrollToFirst
props.description: Whether to scroll to the first event

props.name: format24h
props.description: Whether to use 24 hours format for the timeline hours

props.name: rightEdgeSpacing
props.description: Spacing to keep at the right edge (for background press)
